name: Rightful Reward
title: Tip of the Spear: Rightful Reward
desc: "That is how the world ought to operate, and how righteousness should be."\n"But when it comes to "how things ought to be," it is always fiendishly difficult to get ideal results."

skills.desc: Character's Elemental Burst deals +2 DMG. After your active character takes DMG or is healed: Gain 1 Principle of Justice point. If this card has already accumulated 3 such points, consume 3 points and grant this character 1 Energy. (Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
